p: Eugenol extracts exhibited significant antioxidant potential as measured using DPPH radical scavenging (81%) and reducing power (1.12) at 1.0 μM/ml and 0.1 μM/ml, respectively [ 82]. Hossain and Shah [ 83] reported higher flavonoids content and antioxidant activity as well as positive correlation between them, in chloroform extract of Merremia borneensis. Superoxide anion, hydroxyl radical and hydrogen peroxide radical scavenging activities were reported higher in Torilis leptophylla chloroform extract compared to its ethyl acetate extract [ 78].
